LanguageData.KinseyDisable: Disabling Kinsey scale due to detection of a romance/sexuality mod.
LanguageData.KinseyDetourDisable: Detouring of methods vital to the functionality of some traits was disabled to protect compatibility. Setting the commonality of those traits to zero.
LanguageData.MedicalDetourDisable: Disabling detouring of medical methods due to detection of an assembly medical/surgery mod. This will remove some functionality from Bleeding Heart pawns.
